info.name: PII Anonymization API - Complete Test Suite
info.description: Comprehensive test collection for PII API covering all regions (AMER, APJ, EMEA) and all file formats (PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, CSV, XLSX)

variable.description: UUID of the assessment - update this with a valid assessment ID from your database
Base path to generated documents folder
UUID of the prospect - update this with a valid prospect ID from your database
